head: What is Kea and who is it for?
body: Kea is a group of licensed financial entities that enables businesses to operate globally with just one KYB, covering banking, stablecoins, and crypto services. Powered by our proprietary core banking system, we combine payment intelligence layer with a personal, human-touch approach. Kea is built for high-growth companies, fintechs, and global merchants who need fast, compliant, and reliable financial infrastructure.

head: How do I open a business account?
body:
To open a business account, follow these steps:

  1. Get Started. You can either click “Get Started” to begin the process or book a call with an expert to discuss your needs first.
  2. Choose a Kea Package:
    • KeaClassic: For traditional banking.
    • KeaCrypto: For crypto payments.
    • Kea360: Our combined banking and crypto solution.
  3. Complete KYB. Go through our straightforward “Know Your Business” procedure.
  4. Open Your Account. Once verified, you'll be ready to open your bank and/or crypto account(s) and get started.

head: Which currencies and payment networks do you support?
body:
We support a wide range of fiat and crypto currencies, including:

  • Fiat: U.S. Dollar (USD) and Euro (EUR).
  • Crypto: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), and Tether (USDT).

Our platform is integrated with SEPA for European transfers, SWIFT for global payments, and the ERC20 and TRC20 networks for efficient crypto transactions.

head: Do you support stablecoin on/off-ramps?
body: Yes, we do. We provide instant bank settlements for on/off-ramp transactions for stablecoins, including USDC and USDT. This allows you to quickly and efficiently convert between stablecoins and fiat currencies.
